[30FPS v1.0 (Hold R button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 30000000
20055880 00000004
DD000000 00000100
20055880 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[++FPS++]

[++v1.0++]

[60+FPS v1.0]
D3000000 30000000
20055880 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[Default 60FPS v1.0]
D3000000 30000000
20055880 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[30FPS v1.0]
D3000000 30000000
20055880 00000004
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[--]
